mapper.select: SELECT id, title, poster_url AS posterUrl, overview, ROUND(vote_average, 2) AS voteAverage, vote_count AS voteCount, ROUND(popularity, 2) AS popularity FROM tmdb_anime WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY popularity DESC, title ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tmdb_anime ( id, title, poster_url, overview, vote_average, vote_count, popularity ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{posterUrl}, #{overview}, #{voteAverage}, #{voteCount}, #{popularity} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = VALUES(title), poster_url = VALUES(poster_url), overview = VALUES(overview), vote_average = VALUES(vote_average), vote_count = VALUES(vote_count), popularity = VALUES(popularity), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
INSERT IGNORE INTO anime_genre(tmdb_genre_id, anime_id) VALUES (#{genreId}, #{animeId})
